ngiemboon: Pi lo, ńdíe yé, tà aa mbʉ̀a wɔ́!
en: Go watch him, if he’s home!

ngiemboon: Pi lo, ńdíe yé, tà aa mbʉ̀a wɔ́!
en: Go watch him, if he’s home!

ngiemboon: Ɔ̀ lɔɔn ńtó, ɔ̀ náʼa ńkɔ́ʼ.
en: If you come, you cut a little.
here (close dem. adj. qualifying nouns from all classes)

ngiemboon: Awɔɔn gẅie à gʉ̌a tà ńkúu jʉʼɔɔn lɔɔn.
en: Here he left until he arrived here.

ngiemboon: À lɔ̌ɔn těen ńkwoŋo ngie n tóŋo yé lezíŋ wɔ́.
en: He didn't like me calling him by his name.
